creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long robe with side slits; long sleeves with long open cuffs; red with overall multicolored floral embroidery embellished with gold threads and sequins; gold ribbon trim; edged in scrolled and looped cording in blue, yellow, pink and white; white lining on body, red lining on sleeves
medium: Wool, silk (?), cotton, metallic threads, sequins
title: Robe
